timeline.bodyText: This can be kept, the add-on does not need to be compiled with the snapshot (does not use any new features).
timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,10 +6,20 @@ description = "Adds encode/decode/hash dialog and support for scripted processor
 zapAddOn {
     addOnName.set("Encoder")
     addOnStatus.set(AddOnStatus.BETA)
-    zapVersion.set("2.9.0")

timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,10 +6,20 @@ description = "Adds encode/decode/hash dialog and support for scripted processor
 zapAddOn {
     addOnName.set("Encoder")
     addOnStatus.set(AddOnStatus.BETA)
-    zapVersion.set("2.9.0")
 
     manifest {
         author.set("ZAP Dev Team")
         url.set("https://www.zaproxy.org/docs/desktop/addons/encode-decode-hash/")
+        zapVersion.set("2.10.0")

timeline.message:
encoder: Adapt to 2.10 core

Part of zaproxy/zaproxy#5996

- Build file set notBeforeVersion 2.10.
- Remove "Advanced" from resource key values.
- Make resource key value pairs consistent (equals sign with no spaces
on either side).

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
